messages.title: Join the fight against 'The cuts in the final deal'
messages.content: Claire will fight to get a fair deal for South Gloucestershire to reverse the damaging Conservative cuts.

messages.title: It's a two-horse race here!
messages.content: This bar chart shows the results from the last Parliamentary elections here. The Lib Dems were just 12% behind the Conservatives. Labour and the Greens are out of the race.

messages.title: THORNBURY SCHOOL FUNDING CRISIS
messages.content: Local schools are suffering as a result of the government's failure to fund our children's education properly.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Claire opposes Conservative plans which threaten local hospitals and has been leading the fight to protect local services.
Claire wants new laws for greener energy, insulation for homes and more electric car charging points.
Claire and the Lib Dems have proposed an emergency cash boost for schools, to reverse Conservative cuts.
Claire has called for more local police after Conservative cuts have left South Gloucestershire with fewer officers.
Claire promises more action to tackle the climate emergency and cut your energy bills.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Lib Dems were just 12% behind the Conservatives in the last Parliamentary elections. Labour and the Greens are out of the race.

issues.education: Local schools are suffering as a result of the government's failure to fund our children's education properly. Claire and the Lib Dems have proposed an emergency cash boost for schools, to reverse Conservative cuts.
issues.environment: Claire has been speaking on issues from bees' needs to clean energy. Wants new laws for greener energy, insulation for homes and more electric car charging points.
issues.governance: Results from the last Parliamentary elections show it's a two-horse race here, with Lib Dems just behind the Conservatives.
issues.health: Opposes Conservative plans which threaten local hospitals and has been leading the fight to protect local services.

leaflet.personalStatement: Claire lives locally and understands our area. She's married with a young family and knows how important it is to protect local services like schools and hospitals.

politicalExperience.achievements: Has a strong track record of action as a South Gloucestershire Councillor, including on life-saving fire safety and green issues.

images.caption: Claire and her Focus Team have a record of action
Bar chart representing the two-horse race
